what: Function to calculate features matrix — get_features
title: Function to calculate features matrix — get_features
text: function takes input raw 990 Part IV, VI, XII, output wrangled data frame columns features needed calculate goverannce score.

title: Function to calculate features matrix — get_features
Function to calculate features matrix — get_features
text: dat data.frame columns ORG_EIN correct inputs 990 Part IV, VI, XII. See details . ORG_EIN must character string 9 digits.

title: Function to calculate features matrix — get_features
text: data.frame appended features needed run get_scores function.

title: Function to calculate features matrix — get_features
text: variables Part/Schedule needed run function Variables Part IV: "F9_04_AFS_IND_X", "F9_04_AFS_CONSOL_X", "F9_04_BIZ_TRANSAC_DTK_X", "F9_04_BIZ_TRANSAC_DTK_FAM_X", "F9_04_BIZ_TRANSAC_DTK_ENTITY_X", "F9_04_CONTR_NONCSH_MT_25K_X", "F9_04_CONTR_ART_HIST_X". Variables Part VI: "F9_06_GVRN_NUM_VOTING_MEMB", "F9_06_GVRN_NUM_VOTING_MEMB_IND", "F9_06_GVRN_DTK_FAMBIZ_RELATION_X", "F9_06_GVRN_DELEGATE_MGMT_DUTY_X", "F9_06_GVRN_DOC_GVRN_BODY_X", "F9_06_POLICY_FORM990_GVRN_BODY_X", "F9_06_POLICY_COI_X", "F9_06_POLICY_COI_DISCLOSURE_X", "F9_06_POLICY_COI_MONITOR_X", "F9_06_POLICY_WHSTLBLWR_X", "F9_06_POLICY_DOC_RETENTION_X", "F9_06_POLICY_COMP_PROCESS_CEO_X", "F9_06_DISCLOSURE_AVBL_OTH_X", "F9_06_DISCLOSURE_AVBL_OTH_WEB_X", "F9_06_DISCLOSURE_AVBL_REQUEST_X", "F9_06_DISCLOSURE_AVBL_OWN_WEB_X". Variables Part XII: "F9_12_FINSTAT_METHOD_ACC_OTH", "F9_12_FINSTAT_METHOD_ACC_ACCRU_X", "F9_12_FINSTAT_METHOD_ACC_CASH_X". Variables Schedule M: "SM_01_REVIEW_PROCESS_UNUSUAL_X".

title: Calculate Governance Scores — get_scores
text: function takes data.frame features appends 6 factor scores along total score.

title: Calculate Governance Scores — get_scores
text: feature.matrix matrix containing responses questions organizations. Output get_features function. Rows represent organization, columns represent responses following questions: "P12_LINE_1", "P4_LINE_12", "P4_LINE_28", "P4_LINE_29_30", "P6_LINE_1", "P6_LINE_11A", "P6_LINE_15A", "P6_LINE_18", "P6_LINE_2", "P6_LINE_3", "P6_LINE_8A", "P6_LINE_12_13_14". feature.matrix row NA value, entire row removed output.

title: Calculate Governance Scores — get_scores
text: data frame original input data appended 6 factor scores along total score.

title: Calculate Governance Scores — get_scores
text: function generates factor scores observations input feature.matrix pre-loaded factor model ( factor-objects.Rdata)
